channel.title: CVE Feed for Piotnet -- Piotnet Addons For Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Piotnet -- Piotnet Addons For Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-29934|2024-08-02T14:29:06.202Z -- piotnet -- piotnet%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Piotnet Piotnet Addons For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Piotnet Addons For Elementor: from n/a through 2.4.25.
